thread.section_title: TheMirrorCompany.Com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TheMirrorCompany.Com | themirrorcompany.com | 2 of 21
thread.title: Erin Macbeth:

author: Erin Macbeth:
title: Erin Macbeth:
text: Ordered a mirror for our basement - turned - workout space, and it just arrived and was installed this week. Based on the research I did, the final cost for a mirror of this size and installation was a fantastic deal, and the guys who delivered and installed the mirror were super nice and very efficient. Definitely would highly recommend using the Mirror Company.
